mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from board;
select * from board where title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or writer like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%');
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer});
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updatedate = NOW() where bno = #{bno}
